name: Tails from the Woods
description:
Protect yourself and your friends from forest predators.

In this tactics game, you play with a guinea pig, a rat and a rabbit, protecting themselves from a snake, alligator and a owl. The game has a fixed turn order, always changing between teams and with a turn consisting of a move and attack phase, both skippable.

The relevance to the theme is that the prey are together protecting themselves against predators.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 (https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-8)

The rotate camera buttons are (maybe?) not working. Use A and D instead. Also there are some bugs with the game replay, just refresh the browser.

Credits:
